1.15.0:
- MarkDown data no longer contains interline code blocks

- Improved site localization rules

- Improved methods for determining if text is a code snippet

- Fixed "Beautify Code Block" function reporting not defined error

- Fixed `OJB_observeElement()` method reporting error Issue

- Fix invalid website localization method `strictTraverseTextNodes()`
1.14.2:
- Fix a style error in the editor in dark mode

- Fix wrong initialization value for code editor language selection

- Fix code editor initialization exception in non-chrome browsers
1.14.0: - Fix code editor not loading correctly in some cases Thanks to @smart_stupid @acstor for the feedback!
